comment: Okay so this class is not easy. She will make you work for it. If you are someone that is determined, getting an A will not be hard. You CAN NOT be lazy and get an A in this class. It's just very time consuming. She is super helpful and will help you get an A if you ask for her help.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Took biostats with no prior stat knowledge, didn't find learning it difficult. However, Dr. Lawson provides very little in terms of grading criteria and isn't very helpful outside class, at least during the summer. She is also very disorganized and never provided us with a course schedule, so we always felt like we were kind of winging everything.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Dr. Lawson was great. All the material that you need to do her projects and exam were either in the videos she posted to D2L or she'd go in great detail during class. She also gives bonus points for answering questions during class. Only issue was she would miss class for various reasons and sometimes was not clear that she wouldn't be in class.

Well, Dr. Lawson had a lot going on this semester, so, a lot of rushing, and putting off assignments making it very stressful. Even though I did get annoyed, because it is a lot of work and I didn't feel like I was learning anything.. I really did learn a lot in this class. There are a lot of assignments, a project,and a in class final skills test.

Overall she is a good professor who wants you to do well but she is not clear when explaining assignments/projects. Her office is open when she is not busy with other things in her life. She curves the mid-term grade with the final grade if its higher. She is sick a lot which causes her to miss a lot of class. Other than that I will recommend her

She is a great teacher who loves to help her students. Saying that, she makes you work for your grade! An A is easy to get in the class if you pay attention and do the readings/assignments. She answers emails pretty quickly and is always available for feedback. Dont think that this is a class that you can get an A in by not doing the readings/hw.

Dr. L is amazing! I already have a background in Statistics, but she really wants to make sure you understand the material. You need to attend online lecture or you will have to send a summary for credit. This is an awesome class..

Very nice professor, wants students to come to her office for anything, always dedicated to her students. This class had a ton of work, with an assignment being due every week, sometimes more. Midterm and Final project take an awful lot of time, so dont take it you're a slacker. But in the end, its very rewarding and I will keep in touch with Dr. L

Got a good grade, but didn't feel like I learned much of anything. I probably would have enjoyed the 16 week course more than the 4-week, because it was too much material to comprehend. Just write the reports how she recommends. Don't buy book, never opened it. Lets class pick out syllabus. Overall, very nice and helpful. Wants everyone to succeed.
Had Dr. L for biostat and med epi. One of my fav teachers ever. Do the work, get help when needed.

she was amazing! make appointments to go see her, it really helps and if u completed ur modual then u get extra 10 points. if she sees u put effert into your work, she will work  with u. i got in A+ in her class and didnt have to go to class the last week and half! easy A if u put effert into it!

This class is very interesting; you learn a lot about excel. The subject is nice and makes you think. She is a nice lady but she is really strict about her class and takes the subject too serious sometimes. The tests are a bit hard and long for the short class period but if you do your work and go to the practice test reviews you will do great.

This class is very interesting and you learn a lot about excel. The subject is very nice and makes you think. Dr. Lawson is a nice lady but she is really strict about her class and takes the subject too serious sometimes. The tests are a bit hard and long for the short class period but if you do your work and go to the practice test reviews you wil

Wonderful teacher, very helpful. Sometimes I think she talks too fast or runs through things a little fast and they fly over my head. Go to the study session ask questions, do the readings, study for the test and rack up as much extra credit as possible. I guarantee you you will have learned a lot.

This is such a great teacher. She is extremely helpful and tries her best to make the class fun and interactive. She wants her students to pass as well as learn. Do all of the homeworks and go to lab as much as you can it will work wonders. Take her!

BEST stats professor! You grade your own homework and tests. All her tests and final you're allowed to bring 4 pages of notes. She helps you out A LOT on your project. She's very laid back. Because of her I am now minoring in Statistics. TAKE HER! You won't regret it :)
She is THE person to take for Statistics!  Very helpful - actually wants to you understand and do well in her class.  Book and attendance are mandatory to do do well in this class.
She is the best Stat teacher ever!

dr. lawson turned out to be one of my favorite teachers at ksu. i took stat during the summer and at the beginning of the semester she basically let us make our own syllabus and how much everything would be worth. tests every week.  energetic and funny. good personality.   hw counted as attendance. allows an 8X11 cheat sheet. both sides for tests
Not helpful at all.  Bring personal issue to school, not professional at all

Shes basically the best. She grades strict. Not a big deal though just can't make careless errors. Im minoring in stats now because of her.  She made me enjoy it. Id say schedule around her class so you can get her!

I do like Dr. L, but I think her policy on not accepting late work is bogus.  I missed a test due to a car accident which caused me to stay in the hospital overnight.  Even with a note and proper documentation, I couldn't take the test-- my grade suffered.  She's a great teacher, but DO NOT MISS CLASS EVER!!!
Excellent professor! Dr. L is very helpful.  The material is easy and useful in other classes like Genetics.

she is WONDERFUL!!! she's a really nice woman and a very helpful professor. she really goes out of her way to help you and she is always on webct to answer questions. she'll answer your questions within a matter of hours, not days or weeks like many other professors. if you get a chance to take her, DO IT!! you won't regret it, i promise!!!

If you think you hate statistics or math, TAKE THIS CLASS!  Dr. L is the most helpful math teacher I've EVER had...she goes way out of her way to make sure you know the material.  Tests are a bit hard & time-consuming, but if you do the homework & practice tests, you shouldn't have a problem!  Showing up to this class is a must.

Dr. L is awesome!  She is so willing to help anyone, and will go out of her way via weekends and after hours in order to make sure you have the material down.  Tests are open note/open book, and she gives a practice test beforehand that you grade in class.  Everyone should take her class!!

She's an amazing professor!  Very understanding and helpful, she's willing to use her days off in order to help students.  Slides are on WebCT and she offers practice tests which she grades in class with you to make sure you understand.  Take her class!

Elementary Statistics.  I was not looking forward to this class at all but couldn't be happier with Dr. Lawson.  Very friendly and clear.  Uses nice power point presentation for notes and are downloadable on webCT.  Test are all open book and open notes!! Only problem was I felt rushed for time on some tests.  Great for those who suck at math.
